name: Rainslasher

refinement_effect.refine_one: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 20%.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 24%.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 28%.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 32%.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 36%.

description: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.
